QuestData.Title: Shatter Them!
QuestData.Description: I want you to go out there and I want you to finish them.$B$BBerserkers, Earthrenders, Deathriders... I don't care! I want those stone troggs shattered!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay any 12 stone troggs on the Fractured Front.
QuestData.CompletionText: I need you to shatter a few more, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: That's a good dent, but it's clear to me that we're going to have to handle this a slightly different way.
